trends: There have been 11 other sightings in East Providence
There were no other sightings in East Providence on or around May 12th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in a public parking lot in East Providence, RI, preparing to enter pharmacy. I glanced toward the northeastern sky and noticed what seemed to be a star at first. It was four o'clock in the afternoon with a cloudless, sunny sky. I thought it was strange to see a star in these conditions. As I continued to look at it, I realized that it was getting larger and descending. The whole time, it was flashing very intensely. It came as close to what appeared to be less than a mile away, at an elevation of approximately 500 meters. These are estimates because it was difficult to find adequate references. However, there was a jet plane in the northern sky at the same time, and it was obviously at a much higher altitude. This object then followed a path in a south eastern direction, pausing at times and making course corrections that seemed deliberate. After five minutes, it ascended at what seemed to be a 45 degree angle, at a relatively fast pace and in a direct line due east. I did have a camera phone with me at the time, but did not capture any images. I believe they wouldn't have come out properly and did not want to lose track of it.
Summary: Metallic spherical object pulsates with light, descends, hovers, then ascends after a five minute long path
